name: Hero's Advent
description:
You were on your way home from the college when suddenly, you're pulled into a new dimension. Your human body is transformed into a furry one. Upon arriving, you're told that you're a hero from the prophecy, one that will free the land from the Evil King's grasp. Are you really the hero as the prophecy foretold? And if you are, can you actually defeat the Evil King? Whether your journey would be a wholesome one or a lust-filled one, you decide!

You can support us here: https://www.patreon.com/Platier
